name: SportsQuiz
0:
”Alexa, open Sports Quiz”
”Alexa, start Sports Quiz”
”Alexa, play Sports Quiz”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sports quiz
Developer Terms of Use
des:
World Cup 2022 is here. Celebrate this football season by playing football themed Sports Quiz.

RULES: The rules are simple – each day, we will ask you 3 question on football and give you three options. For correct answer, you score 5 points. Every wrong answer is an opportunity wasted, giving others a chance to go higher up the leaderboard.

BONUS POINTS: What's more – every consecutive day that you come to the game, we will give you bonus points. So the first day, you get 1 bonus point. The next consecutive day, you will get 2 bonus points and so on.

So what are you waiting for? It's fans like you who make the sport worth the while. Go ahead and say, "Alexa, open Sports Quiz" and let the fun begin.
